Title: Mavka: The Forest Song
Director: Oleh Malamuzh, Oleksandra Ruban, Yevheniy Yermak
Actors: Tyler Bunch, Sarah Natochenny, Marc Thompson
Plot: Mavka, a Soul of the Forest, faces an impossible choice between love and her duty as Guardian of the Heart of the Forest when she falls in love with a human, a talented young musician Lucas.
